Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-4207 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.18-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-4207 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.18-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 14.18-1, affected by CVE-2025-4207
